name: Idly
description: Idly is a soft, fluffy steamed rice cake from South India, made from fermented rice and urad dal batter, often served with chutneys and sambar.

name: Dosa
description: Dosa is a popular South Indian dish made from fermented rice and lentil batter, cooked into crispy crepes. It's typically served with chutneys and sambar.

name: Vada
description: Vada is a crispy, savory fritter made from lentil batter, spiced with chilies and herbs, often served with chutneys and sambar.

name: Upma
description: Upma is a savory porridge made from semolina, cooked with vegetables and spices, creating a warm and hearty breakfast dish.

name: Pongal
description: Pongal is a South Indian rice dish made with ghee, cumin, pepper, and lentils, offering a rich and comforting flavor.

name: Poha
description: Poha is a light and fluffy dish made from flattened rice, seasoned with turmeric, mustard seeds, and garnished with fresh herbs.

name: Pesarattu
description: Pesarattu is a type of dosa made from green gram batter, offering a unique and nutritious twist on the traditional dosa.

name: Uttapam
description: Uttapam is a thick pancake made from fermented rice and lentil batter, topped with vegetables and spices, served with chutneys.

name: Puri
description: Puri is a deep-fried bread made from whole wheat flour, often served with potato curry or chickpea stew.

name: Chapati
description: Chapati is a whole wheat flatbread, cooked on a griddle, commonly served with various curries and dals.

name: Biryani
description: Biryani is a flavorful rice dish cooked with fragrant spices, meats, or vegetables, often served with raita or curry.

name: Samosa
description: Samosa is a crispy, triangular pastry filled with spiced potatoes and peas, served with chutneys.
